entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide an easy toggle to control if Satellite Assembly generation should be run #42865
  • `dotnet` CLI does not work under gVisor #42862
  • dotnet format style --include-generated does not format generated files. #42852
  • dotnet run ignores verbosity level and outputs "Building..." even if it set to quiet. #42851
  • Disable Tests Failing Due to Initial net10.0 Branding #42850
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 9RC2 SDK installed, Error "Workload uninstallation failed: Failed to verify Authenticode signature......" for happens when uninstalling workloads but the workload has been uninstalled. #42848

Closed

  • Track signature errors #42870
  • dotnet processes stay alive after running any commands via cmd - on Windows 11 - .NET8 #42868
  • `dotnet build` should error out when building legacy project #9612
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop using IReadOnlyList when it's always single #42866
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Handle Execution ID in dotnet test #42863
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Enable CI builds for the public RC2 branch #42872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • re-enable the framework hosted compiler test #42843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove locale from diagnostic-ids link #42830
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.1xx #42746
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Enable workload search for users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add RemoveJsonPropertyPostAction for symmetry with AddJsonPropertyPos… #42836
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #42837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
